entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
